name: Venom Elemental
movement: swift at 50 ft swimming and 40 ft walking
description: A large, poisonous elemental that can flow through tight spaces and camouflage underwater, characterized by its liquid form and vibrant, toxic appearance.
memorable: Immunity to poison and ability to incapacitate foes with poison damage.
goals: To ambush enemies using its stealth capabilities and poison attack.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other elemental creatures or in environments with water.
environment: Commonly found in aquatic locations like swamps or underwater areas.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and various conditions such as paralysis and exhaustion.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits tactical decisions and combat strategy.
attacks: Makes two powerful bite attacks that deliver both piercing and poison damage, potentially poisoning the target.
most_powerful_ability: Liquid Form allows it to surprise enemies by moving through narrow spaces.
senses: Has darkvision and average perception abilities.
additional_information: Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while underwater
Able to enter a hostile creature's space
Can evade nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Limited communication as it understands Primordial but cannot speak
test_queries: large creature with stealthy underwater camouflage
elemental that can slip through tight spaces
toxic creature immune to poison damage
